DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the safety and efficacy of the brimonidine intravitreal implant in patients with geographic atrophy due to age-related macular degeneration.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Brimonidine Intravitreal Implant in Geographic Atrophy Secondary to Age-related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Geographic atrophy due to agerelated macular degeneration in the study eye Visual acuity better than or equal to 20/125 in the study eye and 20/200 in the fellow eye Cataract surgery or LaserAssisted in situ Keratomileusis (LASIK) in the study eye in the last 3 months Infections in either eye in the last 3 months
